name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection
name_original: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Two of the most popular Dragon Ball Z® games in one special collection now enhanced and re-mastered in high definition for the first time on Xbox 360®.
